function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inadequate understanding of biophilic design principles leading to inefficient integration of 'nature' in architecture.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The emotional need for 'nature' is explained as an inherited affection from the experience of choosing habitats and building dwellings, which can lead to a preference for natural characteristics in modern architectural spaces.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Contact with natural features vegetation and water can generate a quick and positive psychological reaction, reducing negative emotions and fostering recovery from physiological stress and health problems.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Connecting to the local natural environment through incorporating regional features geomorphology and landscape in buildings could generate the 'sense of place' and 'sense of community' and realize personal identity, belonging, and cohesion.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Focus on human contact with natural systems and processes in the built environment could lead to the spread of contagious diseases through exposure to natural elements.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"The theory of biophilia and the instinctive human need for contact with nature may lead to a greater likelihood of exposure to infectious agents present in natural elements.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contagious diseases transmission in built environment due to close interactions and shared spaces.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of ventilation and natural light in built environment leading to poor indoor air quality and mental health issues.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of snowball method to identify publications may result in biased selection of literature, leading to incomplete understanding of biophilic design.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Selection of limited literature on the development of relevant concepts may lead to a narrow perspective on the emergence of biophilic design.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Limited representation of interdisciplinary knowledge may restrict the applicability of biophilic design to address contagious disease propagation in the built environment.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for transmission of contagious diseases through physical contact with natural elements in biophilic design buildings.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and air circulation in biophilic design buildings leading to poor indoor air quality and increased risk of airborne contagions.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of awareness and understanding of biophilic design principles leading to improper implementation and maintenance of natural elements.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of contact with nature in the built environment","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Criticism of 'green-washing' or 'placebo' strategies related to nature in architecture","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of understanding of the emotional needs of humans for interactions with the natural environment in the building environment","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Biophilia leading to close contact with infectious organisms or vectors","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Loss of biodiversity leading to environmental imbalance and disease emergence","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shift in focus of biophilia theory leading to neglect of human-nature relationship","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of access to gardens, parks, or countryside during covid-19 lockdown","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Concealment of lack of real improvements or effectiveness in 'greening' of architecture","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Elusive interpretation of the notion of 'nature' in architectural design","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Climate crises, biodiversity loss, air pollution, and other sustainable challenges","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited research on the impact of nature-based design in architecture","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Significant impact of buildings on human health and well-being","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Proximity to water source in construction","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Designing with natural sceneries in suburban villas","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of front porches to link houses and nature","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ambiguous definition of 'nature' in architecture may lead to misunderstandings and debates about its effectiveness.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Literal greening used as a marketing tool may create false expectations and limited impact on social, economic, and environmental challenges.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of disease transmission in natural design elements could pose a risk to public health in built environments.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of ventilation in the built environment","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shortages of essential medical resources, including sars-cov-2 testing kits, ventilators, and personal protective equipment","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of preparation for future pandemics","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate funding for scientific research during pandemics","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Study limitations on small to medium-sized medical equipment for covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Qualitative comparison of technologies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limitation of search strategy to two databases: google and sciencedirect","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High infection rate caused by close contact between health care workers and patients","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of medical robotics in treatment process","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Application of other types of robotics in hospitals for various tasks","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Robotic technologies for pandemic response are expensive and have long development times, limiting their adoption for covid-19 applications.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shortage of opioid medications and lack of palliative care training for primary caregivers and health care professionals in emergency departments and intensive care units.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High infection rate of health care workers leading to a shortage of health care workers.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Long-term reliance on ppe, especially face masks, may lead to complacency and reduced compliance over time, increasing the risk of disease spread","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient testing and approval of medical inventions for disease prevention may lead to ineffective or unsafe products being used in the market","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shortage of medical equipment like masks and ventilators due to high labor dependency and crowded working environment","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in using 3d printers for producing medical equipment due to cost and efficiency issues","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High infection risks in labor-intensive industries like food processing and delivery","category":"Society","confidence":"High"}]}
